short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Brings back the classic download tray experience, similar to Chrome's old download bar before the download bubble

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
üéâThis extension works almost like the old download tray but with some modern takesüéâ

                                                              ‚ùóCurrently in BETA‚ùó

Donations goes towards further development of the extension:

https://www.paypal.com/donate/?business=FS78BNHS42DYL&no_recurring=0&item_name=Donation+for+the+download+tray+extension+development%21&currency_code=USD

Since it is in BETA expect some features not to work as intended, I'm no veteran in coding so keep that in mind, if you decide to donate for further development thanks!



Features:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
DRAG AND DROP:
Drag and drop files displayed in the tray into windows explorer.
Drag and drop images into the chrome browser to display pictures.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
FILE DOWNLOAD:
Downloads the file with an green progress bar, when it is done downloading the progress bar turns light blue.
Cancel download, press the x to stop the current download.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
TRAY BUTTONS:
Press the x button all the way to the right in the tray to close it down.
Open Downloads folder button, currently opens the document folder on your pc.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
EXTENTION TOOL DROPDOWN:
Opens a small window to turn the extension on or off.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------



What this extension cannot do:
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The extension cannot drag and drop files into websites to upload it to the website.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The extension cannot make the default google download bubble disappear
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The extension cannot drag and drop files into programs.
----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Known bugs:
The extension also sometimes seems to re-download the file if drag and dropped into a windows folder.
